explains: n. 哲学家，哲人；思想深刻的人

sentences.en: Carlos was something of a philosopher.
sentences.cn: 卡洛斯有几分哲人气质。

sentences.en: "While we teach, we learn," said Roman philosopher Seneca.
sentences.cn: “教书时，我们也在学习。” 罗马哲学家塞内加说。

sentences.en: The individual who promoted this idea was a Stoic philosopher.
sentences.cn: 提出这一观点的人是一位斯多葛派哲学家。
